content.description: Start on some nicely sculpted edges deep in the little cave. Pull on with a toe hook and make your way to top out on the cool looking arete.
content.location: On the backside of the "Le Tangent" crag. Easiest way to get there is by going in between the gap with Good Luck in Cambodia on your right and the overhanging compression prow on your left. Maybe a 2 minute bushwack trending left and downhill from here, you'll come up on it from behind.Â

content.description: Start on some crimps below the big eye hueco and work your way to the apex of the boulder.
content.location: Look for a boulder with a big eye in the middle of it and a weird tree on top (you'll see...), very close to Good Luck in Cambodia.

content.description: Cluster of boulders with good, unique rock behind the Organ Donor block.Boulders here:Good Luck in CambodiaPaul is DeadLe Tangent (& traverse)The Big Easy
